roleset.name: (cause to) become yellow, become yellow
roleset.note: YELLOW-V NOTES: Frame created by Claire (from yellow.01-v)
YELLOWING-N NOTES: Based on sentences in medpedia-part1-nouns.Comparison to 'yellow.01'. See VN class other_cos-45.4. Framed by Katie. (from yellowing.01-n predicate notes)

example.name: yellow-v: unaccusative
example.text: The white stationery had yellowed with age.

example.name: yellow-v: arg 1
example.text: yellowing of the skin and whites of the eyes
example.arg: of the skin and whites of the eyes

roleset.name: be the color yellow
roleset.note: YELLOW-J NOTES: Added by Julia based on medi-seedcorpus. (from yellow.01-j)

example.name: yellow-j: naccusative
example.text: The paper was yellow with age

roleset.name: cowardly
roleset.note: YELLOW-J NOTES: Added by Julia based on WordNet. (from yellow.02-j)

example.name: yellow-j: arg1, with subject matter ADV
example.text: The Foreign Secretary did all right, though he was yellow about taking interventions.
